en.pageDesc: Mockoon is a free and open source desktop application allowing to quickly mock servers and API.
en.subTitle:
Mockoon is the easiest and quickest way to run mock APIs locally.
No remote deployment, no account required, open source.
en.downloadSubTitle: Mockoon is released under the MIT license. Feel free to contribute.
en.featuresCol1Desc: Create an unlimited number of mock local servers and routes, and run them in parallel.
en.featuresCol2Desc: customize routes: HTTP methods, regex paths, HTTP status, file serving, custom headers...
en.featuresCol3Desc: Import / export, JSON templating, auto save, proxy mode, HTTPS, latency simulation, CORS support...
en.feedbackDesc: You have found a bug, you have an idea? Submit them on Mockoon's GitHub repository.
en.socialTitle: You like Mockoon? Spread the word :)
